directions: In a medium bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. In a separate bowl, mix egg, milk, melted butter, vanilla and mashed bananas.
Stir flour mixture into banana mixture (batter will be slightly lumpy). Stir in ½ cup miniature chocolate chips.

Heat a lightly greased griddle or frying pan over medium-high heat. Pour ¼ cup batter on griddle for each pancake. Cook until pancakes are golden brown on both sides. Top with sliced bananas, if desired.
Melt remaining ½ cup chocolate chips in microwave and pour into a resealable plastic bag. Snip off a small corner and drizzle chocolate over pancakes. Serve warm with syrup.
ingredients: 2 tbsp. butter, melted and cooled (plus more to grease pan)
⅔ cup bananas, mashed (about 2 large bananas)
title: Chocolate Chip Banana Pancakes
